title: Bisque - 6" X 6" Square Tile (Unpainted, ready for glaze)
features: One Bisque tile approximately 6" x 6" x 1/4"
Includes CD 25 Page full color tile painting guide
description: "Bisque" is the term for pottery that has been fired once to make it solid, but does not have any glaze applied to it. Our bisque is white, ready for you to paint or glaze it just the way you'd like it. While intended to be glazed with cone 04-06 glazes that require kiln firing, bisque can also be painted with acrylic paints that air dry.
